original_text: And as he entered into a certain village, there met him ten men that were lepers, which stood afar off:
korean_text: 한 마을에 들어가시니 나병환자 열 명이 예수를 만나 멀리 서서

sentences.original_text: And as he entered into a certain village
there met him ten men that were lepers
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 문둥병자 열 사람이 나와 만났고
